means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 韦尔地貌名称，或住所名称，来源于古英语，含义是“坝，堰”(dam,weir)
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 韦尔绰号，谨慎的人，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“谨慎的”(wary,prudent)
[地名] [加拿大、美国、英国] 韦尔

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都可表示"商品，货物"之意。
means: goods ： 一般生活或商业用词，指销售或购入的商品。
merchandise ： 正式用词，指商业上销售或商家拥有货物的总称。
ware ： 指上市待卖的商品或货物。多用复数形式。
freight ： 指"货物"时，可与goods互换，此系美国英语。在英国，freight志指船装货物。
commodity ： 作"商品"解时系经济学名词，也可指日用品。

sentence.Network_en: This ware is suitable for decorative purpose but unsuitable for utility.
White conned his way into a job as a ware-houseman with Dutch airline, KLM.
sentence.Network_cn: 怀特骗到了一份工作，在荷兰皇家航空公司做仓库管理员。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 那时他致力于华林（Waring）问题及其有关问题的研究。他的工作曾得到清华大学数学系教授杨武之的指点与帮助。
器字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 器量〖 capacity〗 器皿〖 ware〗 器识〖 capacityandexperience〗.
英文中的同音词_百度知道 ... whales 鲸鱼— ware 商品 whether 是否—.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(W1)|无忧教育 ... wardship 监护 ware 制品 warehouse 仓库.

广州市派陶酒店用品有限公司 ... 礼品杯 gift cup 茶具 tea ware 咖啡杯 coffee.
关于著名景点的英语单词有哪些？_百度知道 ... 历史遗迹 historical site 青铜器 Bronze ware 文人 men of letters.
软件（Soft Ware）是指程序系统，是发挥机器硬件功能的关键。硬件是软件建立和依托的基础，软件是计算机系统的灵魂。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English waru 'commodities', of Germanic origin, perhaps the same word as Scots ware 'cautiousness', and having the primary sense 'object of care'; related to ware
Old English warian 'be on one's guard', from a Germanic base meaning 'observe, take care'
Old English wær, from the Germanic base of ware

entry.def: -ware combines with nouns to refer to objects that are made of a particular material or that are used for a particular purpose in the home.

example.tran: 一盒盒便宜的玻璃制品

means.word_mean: 1. articles of the same kind or material; usually used in combination: silverware; software

Sentence.sentence: At supermarkets, food companies pay to have their wares in places where they're easily seen.
He was inspired by the way the wares were displayed.

sentences.en: They sold their wares at half-price.
sentences.cn: 他们的货品是半价出售的。

jushi.english: Peddlers cried their wares in the streets.
They bought much ceramic ware yesterday.
jushi.chinese: 他们昨天买了大量的陶瓷制品。

jushi.english: You must push your wares if you want better sales.
jushi.chinese: 如果你要想销路好,你必须强行推销你的商品。
